title: Senior Software Engineer - OOD/Configuration Management NEW!
full_description: Senior Software Engineer - OOD/Configuration Management Senior Software Engineer - OOD/Configuration Management - Skills Required - Object Oriented Design, C, Java, Object Oriented Programming, Software Configuration Management, Transmission Control Protocol, JMS, UML Diagram, C++, AgileIf you are a Software Engineer with experience, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with Us HUGE Room for Growth - Great Work/Life Balance/Autonomy - Highly Competitive PayWhat You Will Be Doing Utilizing and Debugging TCP/UDP PacketsWhat You Need for this PositionMore Than 5 Years of experience and knowledge of: Object Oriented Design/Object Oriented Programming - C/C++- Java - Software Configuration Management - Transmission Control Protocol - Software Middlewares: JMS/DDS - Creating a UML Diagram - (Preferred Design tool: Magic Draw) - TCP/UDP PacketsWhat's In It for You 401k - Pension Plan - Paid Paternity Leave - Student Loan Assistance - Commuter Benefits - Medical/Dental/Vision BenefitsSo, if you are a Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.*Senior Software Engineer - OOD/Configuration ManagementAL-HuntsvilleAT7-1553276*
